channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 不動産に特化し、ニュースレター、ポッドキャスト、ビデオなどのサイトを立ち上げるEstate Mediaが、Morning Brew CEOらから165万ドルを調達（Megan Graham/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Megan Graham / Wall Street Journal:
Estate Media, a real-estate-focused outlet launching with a site and plans for newsletters, podcasts, and video, raised $1.65M from Morning Brew CEO and others  —  Estate Media, which was co-founded by Josh Flagg, aims to give advertisers a new way of reaching both industry professionals and home buyers and sellers

item.title: 香港の裁判所は、警察を妨害したとして、香港で報道の自由を主張する最後のグループのひとつである有力ジャーナリストグループの代表に5日間の実刑判決を下した（Jessie Pang/Reuters）
item.description:
Jessie Pang / Reuters:
Hong Kong court sentences the head of a leading journalists group, one of the last groups advocating press freedoms in HK, to five days for obstructing police  —  The head of Hong Kong's leading journalists group was sentenced on Monday to five days jail for obstructing police officers …

item.title: Meduzaは、今年ドイツで同社の創設者ガリーナ・ティムチェンコのiPhoneがペガサスに感染した背後に、ロシアではなくEU諸国が関与していることを示す証拠があると述べている（Stephanie Kirchgaessner/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Stephanie Kirchgaessner / The Guardian:
Meduza says evidence points to an EU country, not Russia, being behind its founder Galina Timchenko's iPhone being infected with Pegasus in Germany this year  —  Galina Timchenko, the CEO of Meduza, was hacked earlier this year before participating in a meeting of exiled Russian journalists

item.title: Reddit、サイト上での「適格な貢献」によって獲得したカルマと受け取ったゴールドに基づき、認証済みユーザーに毎月報酬を支払うコントリビューター・プログラムを開始（Jay Peters/The Verge）
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Reddit launches a Contributor Program that pays verified users monthly based on the karma earned and the gold received for “eligible contributions” on the site  —  Reddit is going to let users spin Reddit gold into real money as part of its new “Contributor Program,” the company announced on Monday.

item.title: スナップは、5月にMy AIでスポンサーリンクをテストすると発表した後、米国と他の一部の市場でMy AIチャットボットでの広告配信を支援するためにマイクロソフトと提携した（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Snap partners with Microsoft to help serve ads in its My AI chatbot in the US and some other markets, after saying in May it would test Sponsored Links in My AI  —  Snapchat has a new advertising partner in Microsoft for the ads it's inserting into its AI product, My AI …

item.title: トランプ大統領、2024年に当選した場合、NBCとMSNBCによる「一方的で悪質な報道」を理由に、コムキャストを「国を脅す反逆罪」で調査すると公約（Rachel Scully/The Hill）
item.description:
Rachel Scully / The Hill:
Trump pledges to investigate Comcast for “Country Threatening Treason” because of “one-side and vicious coverage” by NBC and MSNBC, if he is elected in 2024  —  Former President Trump pledged to investigate Comcast, the parent company for NBC and MSNBC …

item.title: ゲッティはNvidiaと提携し、Generative AI by Getty Imagesを発表した。Generative AI by Getty Imagesは、ゲッティのライセンス写真で学習させたツールで、ユーザーは法的に保護された画像を作成できる（Emilia David/The Verge）
item.description:
Emilia David / The Verge:
Getty partners with Nvidia to launch Generative AI by Getty Images, a tool trained on Getty's licensed photos that lets users create legally protected images  —  Getty Images is partnering with Nvidia to launch Generative AI by Getty Images, a new tool that lets people create images using Getty's library of licensed photos.

item.title: スポティファイがOpenAIと提携し、ポッドキャスターの声を合成して他言語のポッドキャストを再生するAI翻訳機能を発表（Amrita Khalid/The Verge）
item.description:
Amrita Khalid / The Verge:
Spotify partners with OpenAI to debut an AI translation feature that reproduces podcasts in other languages using a synthesized version of the podcaster's voice  —  What if podcasters could flip a switch and instantly speak another language?  That's the premise behind Spotify's …

item.title: 英国司法長官がラッセル・ブランドの記事について法廷侮辱の警告を発し、現在ブランドに対する捜査は行われていないとしてジャーナリストを驚かせた（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
UK's Attorney General issues a contempt of court warning about Russell Brand stories, surprising journalists as there is currently no investigation into Brand  —  Russell Brand has not been arrested, nor is any criminal investigation currently taking place.

item.title: ABC、CBS、NBC、FOXの視聴者の年齢の中央値が近年上昇し、60歳以上の人々が米国の放送ネットワークの中心層となっている（John Koblin/New York Times）。
item.description:
John Koblin / New York Times:
People over 60 have become the US broadcast networks' core constituency, as the median age of viewers at ABC, CBS, NBC, and Fox has ballooned in recent years  —  Viewers have fled prime-time lineups for streaming outlets, with one notable exception: people over 60.

item.title: Artifactのリンク発見機能、モデレーション、Threadsのベアケースとブルケース、Instagramの現状などについてケヴィン・シストロムにQ&A（Jody Serrano/The Messenger）
item.description:
Jody Serrano / The Messenger:
Q&A with Kevin Systrom about Artifact's Links discovery feature, moderation, the bear case and bull case for Threads, the current state of Instagram, and more  —  Kevin Systrom hopes a fresh jolt of growth to his Artifact app allows it to compete better with the industry's bigger relics

item.title: エンターテインメント業界を根底から覆し、25年の歴史に幕を下ろしたネットフリックスのDVDサブスクリプション・サービスを懐かしむ一部の従業員たち（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
Some employees reminisce about Netflix's DVD subscription service, which upended the entertainment industry and is shutting down on September 29 after 25 years  —  The company's DVD subscription service is ending this month, bringing to a close an origin story that ultimately upended the entertainment industry.

item.title: WGAとAMPTPがストライキ終結に向けた暫定合意に到達、3年契約案ではギャラやストリーミングの残額をアップ、新たなAIルールなどを追加（ロサンゼルス・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Los Angeles Times:
The WGA and the AMPTP reach a tentative deal to end the strike; the proposed three-year contract ups pay and streaming residuals, adds new AI rules, and more  —  The Writers Guild of America and the major Hollywood studios have reached a tentative deal that would end a strike that has lasted …

item.title: アナ・ウィンターへのインタビュー：ファッション界のトップに上り詰めた彼女のタフなイメージ、キオマ・ンナディの英国版『ヴォーグ』編集長就任などについて（Lauren Indvik/Financial Times）
item.description:
Lauren Indvik / Financial Times:
An interview with Anna Wintour on her rise to the top of the fashion world, her tough image, Chioma Nnadi's appointment as the head of British Vogue, and more  —  Vogue's global editorial director on her rise to the top of the fashion world — and what she makes of her tough image

item.title: YouTubeに氾濫する、葬儀社や新聞社などの公認出版社からかき集めた死亡記事を男性が読むという、ほぼ同じ内容の死亡記事動画を見てみよう（Kate Knibbs/Wired）
item.description:
Kate Knibbs / Wired:
A look at the flood of near-identical YouTube obituary videos, in which men read obituaries scraped from authorized publishers like funeral homes and newspapers  —  If you Google someone who recently died, you might see a flood of near-identical videos of men reading obits.  Here's why.
